com.sleepycat.client

Class SCheckpointConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sleepycat.client.SCheckpointConfig

  • public class SCheckpointConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies the attributes of an application invoked checkpoint operation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SCheckpointConfig()
      Create a default SCheckpointConfig.
      SCheckpointConfig(boolean force, int kBytes, int minutes)
      Create a SCheckpointConfig with specified attributes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Return the configuration of the checkpoint force option.
      int getKBytes()
      Return the checkpoint log data threshold, in kilobytes.
      int getMinutes()
      Return the checkpoint time threshold, in minutes.

      Configure the checkpoint force option.
      SCheckpointConfig setKBytes(int kBytes)
      Configure the checkpoint log data threshold, in kilobytes.

      Configure the checkpoint time threshold, in minutes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SCheckpointConfig

        public SCheckpointConfig()
        Create a default SCheckpointConfig.

      • SCheckpointConfig

        public SCheckpointConfig(boolean force,
                         int kBytes,
                         int minutes)
        Create a SCheckpointConfig with specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        force - if a checkpoint is always performed
        kBytes - the checkpoint log data threshold, in kilobytes
        minutes - the checkpint time threshold, in minutes

    • Method Detail

      • getForce

        public boolean getForce()
        Return the configuration of the checkpoint force option.
        Returns:
        the configuration of the checkpoint force option.

      • setForce

        public SCheckpointConfig setForce(boolean force)
        Configure the checkpoint force option.
        Parameters:
        force - if set to true, force a checkpoint, even if there has been no activity since the last checkpoint.
        Returns:
        this

      • getKBytes

        public int getKBytes()
        Return the checkpoint log data threshold, in kilobytes.
        Returns:
        the checkpoint log data threshold, in kilobytes

      • setKBytes

        public SCheckpointConfig setKBytes(int kBytes)
        Configure the checkpoint log data threshold, in kilobytes.
        Parameters:
        kBytes - if the kbytes parameter is non-zero, a checkpoint will be performed if more than kbytes of log data have been written since the last checkpoint.
        Returns:
        this

      • getMinutes

        public int getMinutes()
        Return the checkpoint time threshold, in minutes.
        Returns:
        the checkpoint time threshold, in minutes.

      • setMinutes

        public SCheckpointConfig setMinutes(int minutes)
        Configure the checkpoint time threshold, in minutes.
        Parameters:
        minutes - if the minutes parameter is non-zero, a checkpoint is performed if more than min minutes have passed since the last checkpoint.
        Returns:
        this
